name: Tangrowth LV.X
author: Ryo Ueda

poke_power.name: Healing Growth
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, remove 4 damage counters from 1 of your Pokémon. This power can’t be used if Tangrowth is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Big Growth
attacks.effect: Search your discard pile for as many {G} Energy cards as you like and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like.

rule_box: Put this card onto your Active Tangrowth. Tangrowth LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.
